message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product and I think you'd love it!  I'm starting at $100, but I'm open to hearing your thoughts.
I'm interested in the product, but $100 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $60.
Hey Bob, I appreciate your interest! While $60 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, I'm willing to come down a bit. How about $85? I'm confident you'll love this product.
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $75, but I don't think I can go any higher than that.
